announcements.title: Welcome to Otogapo!
announcements.content: Welcome to our car enthusiast community. Please read the community guidelines and enjoy your stay!
announcements.author: 5ubhAuZuKxeUdIGEcaoPVwHC8ro2

announcements.title: Monthly Meetup - January 2025
announcements.content: Join us for our monthly car meetup on January 25th at the Mall of Asia parking lot. Bring your cars and let's have a great time!
announcements.author: 5ubhAuZuKxeUdIGEcaoPVwHC8ro2

announcements.title: System Maintenance
announcements.content: The app will be under maintenance on Sunday, January 12th from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM. We apologize for any inconvenience.
announcements.author: 5ubhAuZuKxeUdIGEcaoPVwHC8ro2
